name: Kitchen Knife [3]

name: Kitty Ear Pudding Hat - Lemon
description: A portable and practical sports cap tailor-made for sports-loving kitty boys. When making this, Coffee Kitty uses special soft materials. The whole hat is as spongy as pudding. This one exhibits a vibrant yellow.
